name: Golden Bullet
description:
One bullet.  Luckily you can get it back!

Successfully dashing into the bullet slows time briefly.

---

Made on Sunday 04 August 2019. 13:00 - 20:45 CEST.
Unfortunately had struggles with audio so had to skip it.
Really wanted to get a tape slow effect when triggering the slow motion. :(

Would be cool to add: Enemies that also has one bullet to fire, so you can compete with them for their extra bullet.
